title: Electric moon
caption: The 'moon' rises for Mid-Autumn Festival
desc: Shenzhen, China - seen in our photo today - is a drone manufacturing hub. So, when this city celebrated Mid-Autumn Festival in 2018, a synchronised fleet of drones took to the skies over Shenzhen Talent Park and lit up in a crescent-moon shape to celebrate the lunar holiday. They were also able to create the shape of Chinese characters reading 'Happy Mid-Autumn Festival'.
